column4: any one that can help me out with ati radeon x1300 256mb graphix  card prob???
i installed beryl thru add/remove application and even the driver...
so plz sum body help me out
Do you see an option for ATI graphics drivers?
Check the box for it and reboot ( or just restart X )
Oh, sorry, confused you with someone else :)
ATI's drivers suck, they don't support Beryl natively
You need to install XGL if you want Beryl with an ATI card
